text: Wester Shadric "Wes" Cooley (March 28, 1932 - February 4, 2015) was an American politician and rancher. Cooley was a member of the Republican. He was a U.S. Representative from for the 1995â€“1997 term. Cooley was born in Los Angeles, California.
